metadata.title: CVE-2019-12448 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in GNOME gvfs 1.29.4 through 1.41.2.daemon/gvfsbackendadmin.c has race conditions because the admin backenddoesn't implement query_info_on_read/write.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12448` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gvfs - 1.36.1-0ubuntu1.3.3
gvfs-backends - 1.36.1-0ubuntu1.3.3
gvfs-bin - 1.36.1-0ubuntu1.3.3
gvfs-common - 1.36.1-0ubuntu1.3.3
gvfs-daemons - 1.36.1-0ubuntu1.3.3
gvfs-fuse - 1.36.1-0ubuntu1.3.3
gvfs-libs - 1.36.1-0ubuntu1.3.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gvfs package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.36.1-0ubuntu1.3.3').
